properties.description: Move data from source blob to relational.COA_Views insert or update and move file to archive

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		View_Name as string,
		Category_Index as string,
		Category as string,
		Sub_Category_Index as string,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item_Index as string,
		Item as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Description as string,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		Insert_datetime as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> COAViewText
